name: Dead Forest Zombie Deer Hunter
description:
Welcome to Dead Forest. A place unlike any other. An unnatural reserve that serves only one purpose - keeping its infected inhabitatns caged from the outside world. They can’t stay there forever though. Someone has to take care of them. That someone is you.

Dead Forest is a first person shooter that puts you in the shoes of a brave individual, whose only task is to eliminate dangers plentiful in this strange environment. It is you who’s responsible for protecting the outside world from the dangers of the reserve. All of the beasts want to get out and wreck havock on the world. Can you stop them? Choose your weapon, aim carefully and eliminate the infected!

You will be looking at the world from the safety of your trusty pickup. It will protect you… But only for a bit. The rest of protecting you will have to take care of yourself. Dead Forest evokes distinct emotions of being set in a strange, fear inducing place.

Are you sure you are up to the task? It’s not for the faint of heart. But take up the challenge and the feeling of accomplishment will be well worth the trouble!
